prompt:
Tell me about a time when you had to be very adaptable to deal with changes?
Once while working on a project with several teams spread across different geographical locations, I encountered unexpected challenges due to last-minute changes in deadlines and scope. To overcome these setbacks, I quickly adapted my workflow by rearranging priorities, delegating tasks efficiently, and keeping all stakeholders informed throughout the process. Despite the initial hurdles, we managed to deliver the project on time with high-quality results, demonstrating our team's resilience and adaptability in the face of unforeseen challenges.
